## SchemaInstance type

Represents the instance data of a schema.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SchemaInstance = {
    $type?: string;
    Content?: FieldsValueDictionary;
    Metadata?: FieldsValueDictionary;
    Region?: EmbeddedRegion;
    RegionXml?: string;
    Schema?: Link;
};
```
